meanings.definition: The daily disappearance of the sun below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: I love watching sunsets with my family every evening.
meanings.sent2: The beach is a popular spot to view beautiful sunsets.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when the sunsets came too early.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the vibrant colors of sunsets.
meanings.sent5: The painter captured the essence of sunsets in his masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The colors and light visible in the sky when the sun disappears below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The sky was painted in hues of orange and pink during the sunsets.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often chase the perfect shot of stunning sunsets.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with a warm glow reminiscent of sunsets.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like the colors of sunsets.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of sunsets never fails to take my breath away.
